Name: Ink-lit Hermit
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Ink-lit Hermit Coating Bundle].
WorldDesc: The quiet river flows through the mountains where cranes live.

Name: Eventide Glow
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Eventide Glow Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The flowing crimson clouds saw her smile.

Name: Ocean Blues
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Oceanic Blues Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The ocean tunes under the blue summer sky.

Name: Deep Sea
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Deep Sea Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The white maiden on the summer beach.

Name: Seaside Sunbath
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Seaside Sunbath Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Summer, white waves, her moment of rest.

Name: Tulle Redbud
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Tulle Redbud Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Summer, fireworks, her unforgettable date.

Name: Summer Sailor
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Summer Sailor Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: "Senior! Hehe, is that how people in the Golden Age call each other?"

Name: Golden Days
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Golden Days Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: "Where are you looking? Focus on the mission first."

Name: Spectral Parade
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Spectral Parade Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: —And builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.

Name: Grace
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Heavenly Gift]
WorldDesc: Amazing Grace, how sweet the sound.

Name: Florescence
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Florescence Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The glare is softened, all look like dust.

Name: Wispthorn
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Wispthorn Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Let the wildfire come out of the thorns, and let the apostate be burned with fire.

Name: Azure Apocalypse
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Secret Pact]
WorldDesc: Break away from the thorns, and return to pureness.

Name: Scarlet Spring
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Scarlet Spring Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: When spring returns to the garden, flowers would blossom brilliantly.

Name: Howling Crown
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Howling Crown Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The crown serves as an oath, but your bond with the Forest Guard can conquer the chilling wind without any vows.

Name: Honor Model
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Honor Model Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Inscribe honor on your chest, and be exemplary with your actions.

Name: Street Rebellion
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Street Rebellion Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Bright red thorns, not trapped by the eyes of others.

Name: Dance of Ripplets
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Endless Summer Blue]
WorldDesc: Even knowing that it might all turn into bubbles and disappear in the end, she just wishes to give her blessings to the one she cares deeply about at this moment.

Name: Aria of Nymph
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Aria of Nymph Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: A fae of the sea, resting by the distant shore, singing along the waves.

Name: Beach Frolics
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Beach Frolics Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: On the island where it is always summer, the enthusiastic young girl chases after you and shouts, "Aloha!"

Name: Wings of Dawn
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Afterglow of Fate]
WorldDesc: The god took the wings and ascended to the sky, becoming the stars and shone light upon the earth so that humans could see daylight again.

Name: Nosferatu
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Nosferatu Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Drink a glass of redness in the dark night in admiration of all beings. No longer accepted by the light, he will still protect you quietly in the darkness.

Name: Deed of Snow Leopard
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Deed of Snow Leopard Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: "What can I do for you, Commandant...? Wait! Why do I have to do this?" Although there is anger in the girl's eyes, she will only bare her fangs when she tries to protect her allies. She will also try her best to temporarily disguise herself for missions. And of course, she won't let anyone take her most important customer away from her.

Name: Spring Huntress
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Spring Huntress Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Inspired by a royal spring hunting tradition thousands of years ago, this coating combines the traditional archer costume with the aristocratic clothing style. It dispels misfortune and misery that imprison the world with the sound of the deities and brings back spring.

Name: Tiger Imperium
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Tiger Imperium Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: A tiger general charges onto the field, slashing at the enemies with his greatsword. To fit the user's untamed style, this new coating is designed with various wild animal patterns that seem to carry the power of a mythical oriental beast, making the user look even fiercer.

Name: Illusionist
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Illusionist Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The magician hides the special gift he prepared in advance with magic and pulls out a red heart with a brilliant magic skill. Even though the audience is already impressed, the magician's eyes only land on one person. Now, he has put his answer in your hand.

Name: Dreamweaver
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Dreamweaver Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: A Coating made based on Pulao's description of her dream. With great passion, Pulao described the tea room waiters, the old man who sold prune drinks, and the shop owner who recommended her this suit. "Char siu buns are the best!" "You look like an idol in this suit!" These sentences always echo in everyone's M.I.N.D. after Pulao's passionate interpretation.

Name: Exorcist
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Exorcist Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The exorcist's lamp shines bright before her chest with her silver blade reflecting her beautiful face. With her golden eyes fixed on the shadow of the past, she will eventually find out the truth at the end of the dark realm.

Name: Wavebender
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Wavebender Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: She has reduced her armor to the minimum to make sure that she can surf freely in the feast of music. However, what interests her more is to lie under a sunshade and watch how helpless you are until she calls you when the time's right, "Commandant, get that for me." As a reward, she will share the small space under her sunshade with you.

Name: Dreamcatcher
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Dreamcatcher]
WorldDesc: The fairytale dream hidden in the corner of the spire is watching over the child in sleep. Though far away from the child it once guards, the forest itself will still be the first to pick up the child when she gets lost. The green fluorescence indicates where the wind comes from, and wings spread in the sea of flowers. She takes a nap here without going anywhere.

Name: Niki US1000
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Niki US1000 Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: "Power system online, wind-pressure balance calibrated, GPS configuration completed... Would you guide me to claim victory in battle once again?"

Name: Radiant Respite
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Radiant Respite Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Even though he was not the initiator, he managed to give you a trip that was perfect for you. With the stars coming out above, he smiles under a street lamp, waving his hand. A night breeze gently puts a period on this date of yours, but before saying your goodbyes, you lightly readjust his slipping scarf. He would never have thought such a trivial move is already enough to make an ever-cool-headed person like him skip a heartbeat.

Name: Fiery Moon
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Fiery Moon Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The fantasy of the pale moon has sealed the false god's grace, for it scorns lives fallen into corruption. She needs no daylight for her glory. With a mere gesture of hers, the ruins of a shattered sanctum will rise anew. Travelers back to the world, have you captured the light fleeting in her eyes?

Name: Vox Solaris
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Vox Solaris Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: She gazes at the morning dew at dawn and starry sky at night. When spring arrives, she wanders along the melting river; when autumn comes, she touches the fallen petals. On rainy days, the girl plays her music alone in the secluded temple, waiting for the sun to rise again. Accompanied by the sky and four seasons, she grasps the remaining fragments. No matter how far they are apart from each other and if the world responds to her invocation, she will keep praying for the one she misses. The rain gradually eases off in the sound of her flute. When dawn comes, the bell rings too. When the sky clears, flowers will bloom again.

Name: Zhuolu's Rain
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Zhuolu's Rain Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: "Lightning rips the day; dark stars fall at night. Friendship, sacrifices, betrayals—she's ditched a lot but carries memories etched in her skin, a tapestry of ancient battles. It's her proof 'they' were real. As history turns to legends and myths get passed down, what kind of world now reflects in the eyes of this lone wanderer?"

Name: Solitary Dream
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Solitary Dream]
WorldDesc: Dreams stir; snowflakes bloom. Sighs awaken sleeping shards, leading dreamers to a snow-kissed church. Saints pray here—even if the gods remain silent, just having you listen is enough. When the forgotten loves and flowers bloom once more, she will return to this place, waiting with a smile for the one who swore an oath to her.

Name: March Hare
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [March Hare Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Out with the old, in with the new—the rabbit brings spring back. With her launcher gone, the girl stuffs "ammo" into her weapon, aims at the sky, and pulls the trigger to announce the arrival of spring. Wishes shoot across the sky; blessings boom through the air. Under the night sky ablaze with blossoming fireworks, a fleeting light graces the window ledge. What dreams is this pensive rabbit quietly weaving?

Name: Mesektet
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Mesektet Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: She is a radiant sun that unfurls the banner to illuminate the darkness. She is the winds of the underworld that howl across the sky to mark the border between life and death. She is the vanguard of the gods, the leader of heroic souls, the deity silently awaiting the long night. When the sun sets and the sacred ibis spreads its wings, will you join her in an eternal expedition to defend the oath sworn by both of you?

Name: Vermillion Bargain
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Vermillion Bargain Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: She turns her back against the gods in the deepest night and chants the forbidden spell with her life. Flickering candlelight sways over her familiar face. No matter how long you have parted from each other, the pact and oath you made will eventually light up the lost memories, bringing back everything that was once lost. "...I have come to fulfill the Crimson Pact."

Name: Nocturnal Watch
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Nocturnal Watch Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The girl chases evil at midnight in the jungle of steel, guarding the city's night alone. Even when midnight has passed, she still presses down on the brim of her hat and knocks on the next hidden door, leaving a violet silhouette on the armor behind.

Name: Abyssal Dye
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Abyssal Dye Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The sailors have come back with not only goods, but also legends. Some say she is a siren, luring humans to her beauty; some claim she is a guardian goddess, pointing direction to the lost vessels. When she leaps out of the sea, rainbow would follow; her tears hold the promise of miraculous healing and eternal life. Countless travelers have embarked on quests in search of these tears. However, what moves her heart to shed those drops?

Name: Flowing Dreams
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Flowing Dreams Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Although Selena has never tried anything like it before, this coating feels tailor-made for her. Unlike the vague recollections of her usual attire, it allows for effortless movement and running, while also possessing the uncanny ability to uplift her spirits. Could it be that the designer of this coating intended to reveal a new facet of Selena? Hoping to witness her radiant smile by the seaside, accompanied by a joyous melody sung from her heart?

Name: Diving Shadow
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Diving Shadow Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Diving under the water immediately takes away all the hustle and bustle of life, leaving only the shimmering sunlight in tranquility. The ocean is free for explorers to wander, with endless beautiful things and scenes. One cannot help but want to capture and share these splendid moments with their most important ones, or invite them to swim in this very sea together. After all, wishes are no longer just wishes; they are within reach between the waves.

Name: Neon Dynamite ☆
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Neon Dynamite]
WorldDesc: In the radiant spotlight, let your dreams unfold; Eager ears listen, seeking where you behold. Each subtle motion can ignite the hidden emotion; Yet, in this moment, let your restless heart find resolution. Though it may not align with your every desire, ensure your hair's perfection; Are you ready? The dream stage awaits, just a single step away.

Name: Nightbreaker
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Nightbreaker Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Another midnight, lightning and fire light up the raging storm... When all is peaceful again, the girl flips her wrist to sheath her blade. Before the wailing sirens arrive, she has already vanished at the end of the street. Nobody knows who she is; criminals call her the White Nightmare, while law enforcers identify her as a vigilante. The strong see her as trouble, while the weak call her a savior... But regardless of how the world may judge her, as long as evil continues to breed in the shadows where light cannot reach, she has never wavered in her mission to cut through the darkness.

Name: Dazzler
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Dazzler Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The keynote of the battlefield is not black, white, or gray! Every leap of the girl will be the strongest order in the battle game. With Ayla's favorite elements added to it, this super-mobile new coating is hands-down an eye-catcher on the battlefield.

Name: Ashen Wings
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Ashen Wings Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Above a tower surrounded by dark thorns, the girl activated a forbidden ritual to turn herself into an immortal existence, only to protect the people under her throne. A century has passed, and all her enemies have perished, yet the undying queen is still sitting on the throne in her desolate city, waiting for the next challenger to free her from the never-ending duty. Do you have the courage to accept her challenge?

Name: Grandiose Glamor
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Grandiose Glamor]
WorldDesc: Her lance can break through any formation; her horse has trampled over the western land. "Once upon a time, there was a valiant female general who had achieved countless merits. After retiring from the royal guards, she became a guardian of Babylonia city, bringing doom upon all thieves and bandits. The civilians finally had a peaceful life, and everybody was delighted..." —Tales of the Babylonia Legends

Name: Revival Remedy
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Revival Remedy Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Her gown is white like snow, her dark teal robe dampened by morning dew. Wherever the miracle doctor visits, all diseases will go. "Have I told you about this doctor in Babylonia? Despite her young age, she has remarkable medical skills. A baby had been crying for three days, but stopped as soon as this doctor took one look at it. Everyone praises her as a reincarnation of the legendary doctor..." —Tales of the Babylonia Legends

Name: Solitary Longings
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Solitary Longings]
WorldDesc: A wandering fish drifts silently in her dream, gazing at the flickering light upon the shore. Waves rise and fall, shattering the illusions and devouring the false dreams. If only this fleeting moment could last forever... Could it capture the distant, unreachable light on the far-off waves for her?

Name: Moonlight Soliloquy
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Moonlight Soliloquy Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The chilling moonlight dyes the night sky.

Name: Vow of Dragon
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Vow of Dragon Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The dragon soars and the fish leaps amidst the crimson mist.

Name: Pyrewatch
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Pyrewatch Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Demons will burn, souls will rest.

Name: Twilight Veil
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing limited-time pack [Twilight Veil Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: May the dim light guide you home in the twilight.

Name: Flying Apsara
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing limited-time pack [Flying Apsara Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: In the painting, the flying Apsara dances.

Name: Tiny Bad Wolf
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Tiny Bad Wolf Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: A little explorer weaves through the colorful balloons and the carousel.

Name: Blue Crush
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Blue Crush Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The rainbow-like girl waves the paintbrush in her hand, forever capturing the splendor of this azure world.

Name: Tsubaki
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Tsubaki]
WorldDesc: As ghosts and spirits scatter, the truth returns.

Name: Crystalline Glance
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Crystalline Glance Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: At the end of the Sea of Glass lies the memory that's frozen in this moment.

Name: River Dancer
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [River Dancer Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: With lotus in her hair and golden threads flowing.

Name: Prestigious Accolade
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Prestigious Accolade Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The corona silently vows to become the light and burn its body away.

Name: Warding Ritualist
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Warding Ritualist Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: With Thunder Talisman, evil spirits be gone!

Name: Candy Rider
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Candy Rider Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Beneath the neon lights, the sleepless night is racing through.

Name: Hell Sing
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Hell Sing Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: With a sharp blade, evil is slain, and wandering souls are banished to oblivion.

Name: Wings of Equilibrium
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Wings of Equilibrium Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: She wanders the farthest reaches of the world, singing immortal arias as she gazes at the stars.

Name: Tainted Moonrise
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Tainted Moonrise]
WorldDesc: However desolate it may be, a temple remains sacred, just as a crumbled statue still embodies divinity.

Name: Carmine Ripples
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Carmine Ripples Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: With heartfelt thanks, I bid the leaves depart.May you journey forth, gently to the mortal heart.

Name: Resplendent Debut
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing limited-time pack [Resplendent Debut Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Gorgeous opera scripts. Magnificent landscapes.

Name: Love's Dawn
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Love's Dawn]
WorldDesc: Our love endures this day and all days, now and forevermore.

Name: Obsidian Balladeer
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Obsidian Balladeer Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Let our story become a fable written by time as it ticks away.

Name: Tapestry of Spring
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Tapestry of Spring Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: A grand celebration for the Spring Festival.

Name: Fatal Temptation
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Fatal Temptation Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Her presence is charming, mystical, and bewitching.

Name: Hollow Crown
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Hollow Crown Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: She is the lord of the doom fire and the end of humanity made flesh.

Name: Starward Dragon
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Starward Dragon Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Let's go hunting!

Name: Ritual of Souls
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Ritual of Souls Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The divine maiden hums a song, offering tribute to the heavens.

Name: Sandy Spectrum
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Sandy Spectrum Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Dressed in a pale violet outfit, she looks back at you on the glimmering beach.

Name: Rippling Luminescence
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Rippling Luminescence Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: All the good things in this world have arrived in their own perfect time.

Name: Thorns of Crimson
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Thorns of Crimson Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: From the embers, a flame is kept, guiding lost souls to rest.

Name: Threads of Destiny
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Threads of Destiny]
WorldDesc: In this daze, a distant summer washes over you once more.

Name: Infernal Deliverance
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Infernal Deliverance Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Hush. Do you hear them? The wails that are stuck in their throats.

Name: Sparragon's Triumph
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Sparragon's Triumph Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: The vermilion sun sinks into the sea. The Sparragon soars into the sky.

Name: Lotus Melody
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Lotus Ballad Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: A fleeting vision, a moment of grace.

Name: Graffiti Code
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Stellar Rush]
WorldDesc: Let every dream be bathed in neon light.

Name: Nightfall Finale
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Nightfall Finale]
WorldDesc: This moment, too, is a fragment of eternity.

Name: Sash of Silence
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Sash of Silence Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: Yui silently governs all souls.

Name: Roulette of Stolen Time
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Roulette of Stolen Time Coating Bundle]
WorldDesc: This is a game where souls are at stake. Are you ready to play?

Name: Path of Remembrance
LockDesc: Obtain by gaining 5★ from the challenge stages in Arcade Anima - Nightblade's Heart-Lock Trial.
WorldDesc: Before he became a "Forsaken", he had walked a long journey. Each footprint he left was to lead countless footprints forward. Each footprint he left was a memorable moment in his life.

Name: On the Brink of Abyss
LockDesc: Obtain by gaining 5★ from the challenge stages in Arcade Anima - Crimson Abyss' Heart-Lock Trial.
WorldDesc: Holding a katana in hand, she stands on the brink of an abyss. Her katana has already endured through hell. No matter what obstacles lie ahead, she will cut them down and continue on her path.

Name: Come Play!
LockDesc: Obtain by gaining 5★ from the challenge stages in Arcade Anima - Starfarer's Heart-Lock Trial.
WorldDesc: It's because of your participation that a game can truly be a game, a challenge can truly be a challenge... and life can truly be life. Come, let's enjoy gaming together!

Name: Heart Compass
LockDesc: Obtain by gaining 5★ from the challenge stages in Arcade Anima - Scire's Heart-Lock Trial.
WorldDesc: Let the Milky Way guide your heart.

Name: Candle Light Torment
LockDesc: Obtain by gaining 5★ from the challenge stages in Arcade Anima - Arca's Heart-Lock Trial.
WorldDesc: The dead are the wax, while the living are the wicks. Guided by the demise of lives, the survivors will carry their light onward but are also burned by their memories forever.

Name: Land of Bliss
LockDesc: Obtain by gaining 5★ from the challenge stages in Arcade Anima - Vera's Heart-Lock Trial.
WorldDesc: The next pure land shall be mine to pioneer.

Name: Portrait - Task Force
LockDesc: Available after clearing Stronghold Chapter 8
WorldDesc: The symbol of Task Force.

Name: Kuroro
LockDesc: Event Rewards
WorldDesc: A mysterious mechanical race found in many places on the surface. Has a keen interest in collecting Cogs.

Name: Portrait - Special Identity
LockDesc: Available after purchasing 10,000 Rainbow Cards
WorldDesc: Sorry, but I refuse to reveal my true identity as a commandant.

Name: Kuroro Commandant
LockDesc: The reward issued to players who pre-registered with the official website. Sent via mail
WorldDesc: A mysterious machine wearing a commandant's jacket.

Name: Mini-TV Commandant
LockDesc: The reward issued to players who pre-registered with Bilibili. Sent via mail
WorldDesc: A mini-TV wearing a commandant's jacket. It seems to be mistaken for a cloth hanger.

Name: Mr. Potato
LockDesc: Available via special events
WorldDesc: A popular fast food dish in Babylonia. Still going strong after many challenges.

Name: RIP Potato
LockDesc: Available via special events
WorldDesc: In commemoration of Mr. Potato, now ripened and cooked.

Name: OVERLORD
LockDesc: Obtain from purchasing Children's Day Bundle
WorldDesc: Special cover Children's Day illustration "Celica—Overlord of the Sky"

Name: Pure White
LockDesc: Available via special events
WorldDesc: Face the darkness with hope.

Name: Amberia
LockDesc: Obtained after defeating Amberia in Elegy Of Nightmare
WorldDesc: May you find real happiness when you wake up, Amberia.

Name: Deformed Structure
LockDesc: Unlocked by participating in [Deformed Structure] Coating Design Contest
WorldDesc: Hard work is the best proof.

Name: Hymn of Victory
LockDesc: Available via Anniversary Event
WorldDesc: More than a simple dessert, this cake also pays tribute to all the outstanding contribution make by the commandant. Let the hymn of victory commend your achievements, may mankind's honor always be blessed.

Name: Thanks for Support!
LockDesc: Participate in limited event [Potato's Attack! Support Solon Lee!] to earn the Portrait
WorldDesc: No matter which side you pick, Nanami will always give you best wishes with a hand gesture that she doesn't even understand.

Name: Jasper Gentleman
LockDesc: Obtained after choosing [Potato Server] faction and winning the event
WorldDesc: The photo taken to celebrate the potato's victory. Thank you for your contribution! Our potato server will coooonnntinnueee to ppprovide s-s-s-s-table connection in f-f-future

Name: Snow Vanquisher
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of event [Fortune January]
WorldDesc: Our highest regards to the trailblazers in the New Year.

Name: Moment of Respite
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the [A New Divide] sign-in event
WorldDesc: The cake carries our wish for you and our gratitude and advice to you—"Thank you for what you did in the past year. Get some rest." Please sit for a while with everyone to create a great memory together. Happy second anniversary, Commandant!

Name: Tiger Roar, Spring Back
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the event [Spring Blossom]
WorldDesc: The gold tiger roars to bring good luck and prosperity in the new year.

Name: Lingering Sweetness
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Everglowing Justice]
WorldDesc: This festival belongs to everybody. All the memories in the past year have turned into the lingering sweetness on your palate. "You have been our commandant in the past, and will always be in the days to come." Happy 3rd anniversary, Commandant!

Name: Rabbit Ushers the New Spring
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Happy New Year]
WorldDesc: The Moon Palace bestows new blessings. The Jade Rabbit glows with new radiance.

Name: Decorated Days
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Lamento di Phantasma]
WorldDesc: As time goes by, our sweet memories have converged into a meaningful journey across time. Our love and thoughts are with you. May we continue to walk this journey together in the future to come. Happy 4th anniversary, Commandant!

Name: White Prayer
LockDesc: Available after purchasing 30000 Rainbow Cards
WorldDesc: The innocent girl prays with her heart.

Name: Dragonback Reunion
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Odes to Spring]
WorldDesc: Have a glass of wine while riding on the dragon's back.

Name: Catwalk
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Stars Ensnared]
WorldDesc: The music plays on, and she dances with feline grace.

Name: Unfinished Music
LockDesc: Obtained by purchasing [Punishing: Gray Raven Illustration Collection Vol.2]
WorldDesc: Listen, Conductor. May the notes of this song reach the future you long for.

Name: Fire of Oath
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Keyboard Accessory]
WorldDesc: Wings of flame, illuminating the mist, a vow forged in steel, an unwavering resolve.

Name: Sweet Magic
LockDesc: [Obtain from the Treasure Gem Collab event.]
WorldDesc: Commandant, I can smell candy on you! Hand it over, now! Or I'll use my mischief magic on you!

Name: Post-feast Musings
LockDesc: [Obtain from the Treasure Gem Collab event.]
WorldDesc: Dear Commandant, I've brought many flavors of candy tonight. I wonder which one you'll like?

Name: Reminiscent Silhouette
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Wither to Shine]
WorldDesc: Looking back at the paths we've traveled, the joys and hardships we've shared have shaped our treasured memories. Wherever you are, we'll always be here for you! Happy 5th Anniversary, Commandant!

Name: Blessing of the Snake
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Lasting Jubilation]
WorldDesc: A prosperous Year of the Snake.

Name: Undecided
LockDesc: Obtained by purchasing [Punishing: Gray Raven Illustration Collection Vol.3]
WorldDesc: I long to be your shadow, bound to you until your dreams come true.

Name: TCG - Crimson Weave
LockDesc: Obtained by attending the offline preview event for Punishing: Gray Raven - Card Battle, and claimed using a gift code.
WorldDesc: Now, I am your cage.

Name: TCG - Plume
LockDesc: Obtained by attending the offline preview event for Punishing: Gray Raven - Card Battle, and claimed using a gift code.
WorldDesc: I spread my Gray Raven wings and soar.

Name: Finish Line Kuroro
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Stellar Rush]
WorldDesc: Power! Speed! Roar! Feel the thrill of the track!

Name: Tales of Light
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the sign-in event [Where Nightmares Dwell]
WorldDesc: In the warm sweetness brewed by time lie six years of scattered memories. Those unforgettable moments—the first meeting, the nights spent together, the joy of reunion—have all condensed into faint marks on film, captured in the small space of a cake.

Name: Portrait Frame - Ephemeris
LockDesc: Reach the [Ephemeris] grade in Autopoiesis Maze
WorldDesc: WGAA's latest design. Used to mark the Commandant's progress in exploring Autopoiesis Maze. (You will receive a portrait frame for every grade you reach in the maze)

Name: Portrait Frame - Purgatory
LockDesc: Reach the [Purgatory] grade in Autopoiesis Maze
WorldDesc: WGAA's latest design. Used to mark the Commandant's progress in exploring Autopoiesis Maze. (You will receive a portrait frame for every grade you reach in the maze)

Name: Portrait Frame - Apogee
LockDesc: Reach the [Apogee] grade in Autopoiesis Maze
WorldDesc: WGAA's latest design. Used to mark the Commandant's progress in exploring Autopoiesis Maze. (You will receive a portrait frame for every grade you reach in the maze)

Name: Portrait Frame - Formless
LockDesc: Reach the [Formless] grade in Autopoiesis Maze
WorldDesc: WGAA's latest design. Used to mark the Commandant's progress in exploring Autopoiesis Maze. (You will receive a portrait frame for every grade you reach in the maze)

Name: Portrait Frame - Masses
LockDesc: Reach the [Masses] grade in Autopoiesis Maze
WorldDesc: WGAA's latest design. Used to mark the Commandant's progress in exploring Autopoiesis Maze. (You will receive a portrait frame for every grade you reach in the maze)

Name: Portrait Frame - Galore
LockDesc: Reach the [Galore] grade in Autopoiesis Maze
WorldDesc: WGAA's latest design. Used to mark the Commandant's progress in exploring Autopoiesis Maze. (You will receive a portrait frame for every grade you reach in the maze)

Name: Portrait Frame - Tiger & Clouds
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the event [Fortune's Favor]
WorldDesc: From the west, the tiger strides along; punishing evil, averting wrong. Its lengthy tail spans the sky's dome, through the heavens the tiger roams.

Name: Portrait Frame - Solitary Dream
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Solitary Dream]
WorldDesc: Dreams stir; snowflakes bloom. Sighs awaken sleeping shards, leading dreamers to a snow-kissed church. Saints pray here—even if the gods remain silent, just having you listen is enough. When the forgotten loves and flowers bloom once more, she will return to this place, waiting with a smile for the one who swore an oath to her.

Name: Portrait Frame - Divine Blessing
LockDesc: Available after purchasing 30000 Rainbow Cards
WorldDesc: Have you heard my wishes, Commandant?

Name: Portrait Frame - Solitary Longings
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Solitary Longings]
WorldDesc: A wandering fish drifts silently in her dream, gazing at the flickering light upon the shore. Waves rise and fall, shattering the illusions and devouring the false dreams. If only this fleeting moment could last forever... Could it capture the distant, unreachable light on the far-off waves for her?

Name: Portrait Frame - Tsubaki
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Tsubaki]
WorldDesc: As ghosts and spirits scatter, the truth returns.

Name: Portrait Frame - Love's Dawn
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Love's Dawn]
WorldDesc: I will love and protect you faithfully, whether it be today, tomorrow, or forever.

Name: Portrait Frame - Threads of Destiny
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Threads of Destiny]
WorldDesc: Wishes spin into silken threads, weaving a bond that gently ties two hearts and their future together.

Name: Portrait Frame - Racing Inferno
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Stellar Rush]
WorldDesc: Chase the speed! Rule the racing world!

Name: Solon Lee's Diamond Heart
LockDesc: Obtained after choosing [Guardian Solon Lee] faction and winning the event
WorldDesc: The souvenir after a successful defense. Thank you for your faith in Solon Lee! This is not made from potatoes... Absolutely not!

Name: Silky Fragrance
LockDesc: Awarded to participants of the limited event [Scarlet Spring]
WorldDesc: The spring breeze leaves a pleasant fragrance on the silky outfit.

Name: Star of Revival
LockDesc: N/A
WorldDesc: The ultimate accolade from Norman Mining Corp to its best employee. Let's remember this moment on the path to revival.

Name: Gray Raven, Assemble!
LockDesc: Obtained by purchasing [1st Anniversary Illustration Collection Vol.1]
WorldDesc: Gray Raven will always be together no matter where you are.

Name: Fish and Fish and Fish
LockDesc: Unlocked by purchasing [Keyboard Accessory]
WorldDesc: Did you lose this salted fish or grilled fish, Gray Raven Commandant...

Name: Sunflower Treasure
LockDesc: ChaCha Sunflower Seeds Collaboration
WorldDesc: "A gift for me...? How did you know I like this Kowloong snack? Found the way to tickle my fancy, didn't you?"

Name: ChaRismatic Affinity
LockDesc: ChaCha Sunflower Seeds Collaboration
WorldDesc: "I didn't think you'd enjoy this Kowloong snack so much. Guess my skills haven't gotten rusty."

Name: 謹賀新年
LockDesc: 謹賀新年ログインボーナスで獲得
WorldDesc: 指揮官！あけましておめでとうございます！わー！「兎ちゃん」いっぱい！

Name: Deep Tide Scholar
LockDesc: Obtained by completing a certain number of missions in [Journal of Reversing Tides] of [Cursed Waves]
WorldDesc: This certificate is granted to those Curse Quellers who, within the crevices of reincarnation, dedicate themselves to unraveling the true nature of the sound of the tide.

Name: Contract
LockDesc: Obtained by completing a certain number of missions in [Journal of Reversing Tides] of [Cursed Waves]
WorldDesc: As a gift for fulfilling the contract, the Girl acknowledges your resolve.

Name: Matrix Walker
LockDesc: Obtained by completing a certain number of achievement missions in [Derived from Matrix] - [Interleaved Sectors]
WorldDesc: The swaying pendulum echoes across the Matrix Sea. Before tomorrow comes, will you reach beyond first, or lose yourself in a mirage?

Name: Fateful Journey
LockDesc: Obtained by completing a certain number of achievement missions in [Derived from Matrix] - [Interleaved Sectors]
WorldDesc: When the string is on the brink of breaking, how is it going to play the melody that transcends fate?

Name: Clash of Illusions
LockDesc: Awarded to players who have completed the challenge in [Clash Reflection] High Power Zone.
WorldDesc: You have calculated the derivation of anomalies, interfered with the collapse of paradoxes, and participated in the cycles of fission. Your silhouette and decisions have been engraved in these majestic calculations. You have won yourself a certificate to embrace tomorrow with these merits.

Name: Star of Revival
LockDesc: Clear [Abyssal Mountain Deep Hive] in Norman Revival Plan
WorldDesc: The ultimate award presented to Norman Mining Corp employees. May this moment be remembered on the path of revival.

Name: クロロもち
LockDesc: 新年イベントで獲得
WorldDesc: 謎の生物クロロの鏡餅バージョン…食べられないけどね

Name: Portrait - Volatile Priestess
LockDesc: Available via event
WorldDesc: A portrait representing the ritual to worship wild gods in ancient times. Recreated from old data of the Earth.

Name: がお～
LockDesc: 2022年Xmas＆新年ログインボーナスで獲得
WorldDesc: 白銀の少女からの寅年の祝福

Name: ビット風21号
LockDesc: コラボグッズ購入特典
WorldDesc: コラボグッズ限定描き下ろしデザインによる21号ビット風アイコンです。

Name: Joyous Moments
LockDesc: Available via special means
WorldDesc: New Year, New Feels! —Imochikay Okattayay

Name: Happy New Year!
LockDesc: Available [Happy New Year] Sign-in event
WorldDesc: Commandant! Commandant! Do you want to become a "rabbit" with us?

Name: Dragonback Reunion
LockDesc: Available [Spring Blossom] Sign-in event
WorldDesc: Raise a toast to the New Year and begin an exhilarating dragonback journey.
